alert.note: Alert for Eastern Ascension; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 3:18PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Ascension and Livingston Parishes through 345 PM CDT... At 318 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Livingston, or 14 miles east of Denham Springs, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Walker, Livingston, French Settlement, Albany, Port Vincent and Whitehall. This includes Interstate 12 between mile markers 13 and 32. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Ascension; Northern Livingston; Southern Livingston; Western Ascension
